fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Destroy a players house in rage during the night, roleblocking them, their visitors, and who they visit. (3 uses)

fields.name: Insatiable Vexation:
fields.value: Instead of roleblocking, kill your target, their visitors, and who they visit. (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Roleblock, Control, and Redirection Immunity.
- When you are attacked for the first time, you will kill your target in rage regardless of their defense level.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Devolve the town into sin and chaos, eviscerate all who would try to banish you or Satan.
